com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FHorizontalLayouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FLayouter
          • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FHorizontalLayouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FHorizontalLayouter
extends FLayouter
    Layouter class to position any number of FComponents next to each other horizontally.
    Author:
    cp

        public FHorizontalLayouter(java.lang.String id)

    • Method Detail

      • setCellOrientation

        public void setCellOrientation(FHorizontalLayouter.VerticalOrientation orientation)
        Sets the layouting options of the elements within their respective cells (in case that elements are of different heights). Elements can be centered or located to the top or bottom of their cell. Note, that there is no need for horizontal layout switches are elements are usually rendered immediately next to each other.
        Parameters:
        orientation -

      • setFullWidth

        public void setFullWidth(boolean width100)
        Decides whether the elements' cells are supposed to take up a combined 100% of the available width, possibly causing spacings between them (otherwise they would take just as much as needed)
        Parameters:
        width100 -

      • setCellSpacing

        public void setCellSpacing(java.lang.String spacing)
        Sets a separating space between cells (default is 0).
        Parameters:
        spacing - Desired space in any CSS unit, e.g. "10px", "1em", "2mm", ...
